paragraphs.text:
%python
def func(e):
    a = e ** 2
    return a
func(3)
   
square2 = lambda e: e** 2
square2(4)

%pyspark
rdd=sc.parallelize([1,2,3,4])
rdd2 = rdd.map(lambda x: x * 2)
rdd2.collect()

%pyspark
rdd=sc.parallelize([1,2,3,4])
rdd2 = rdd.filter(lambda x: x % 2 == 0 )
rdd2.collect()

%pyspark
rdd = sc.parallelize([(1,2), (3,4), (3,6)])
rdd2 = rdd.reduceByKey(lambda a,b: a + b)
rdd2.collect()

%pyspark
accum = sc.accumulator(0) 
rdd = sc.parallelize([1, 2, 3, 4]) 

def f(x): 
    global accum
    accum += x  
 
rdd.foreach(f) 
accum.value

wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ywchiu/micronbigdata/master/Spark/u.data
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ywchiu/micronbigdata/master/Spark/u.item
mv u.data /tmp/
mv u.item /tmp/

res = movieCounts.sortBy(lambda a: -a[1])
res.take(3)

sqlContext = SQLContext(sc)

row_data = csv_data.map(lambda p: Row(
    userid=p[0], 
    itemid=p[1],
    rating=int(p[2])
    )
)
row_data.take(3)

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
ratings_data = sqlContext.sql("""
    SELECT userid,avg(rating) from ratings group by userid
""")
ratings_data.show()

%pyspark
ratings_row_data = ratings_data.map(lambda p: 
    Row( userid=p[0], movieid=p[1], rating=int(p[2]) )
)

ratings_row_data.take(3)

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
movies = sc.textFile('file:///tmp/u.item', 4)

movies_data = movies.map(lambda l:l.split('|'))
movies_data.take(3)

%pyspark
movies_row_data = movies_data.map(lambda p: 
    Row(movieid=p[0], moviename=p[1] )
)
movies_row_data.take(3)

msg.data: [Row(movieid='1', moviename='Toy Story (1995)'), Row(movieid='2', moviename='GoldenEye (1995)'), Row(movieid='3', moviename='Four Rooms (1995)')]

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
best_movies = sqlContext.sql("""
     SELECT moviename,avg(rating) as avg_rating, count(1) as cnt  from movies inner join ratings on ratings.movieid = movies.movieid group by moviename order by  cnt  desc limit 10
""")
best_movies.show(5)
